author: K. Oanh Ha and Anuradha Raghu / Bloomberg
title: Now The World’s Hospitals Are Running Out of Vital Rubber Gloves
description: An impending glove shortage will soon be compounded by measures to contain the virus in a country that dominates production: Malaysia
content:
(Bloomberg) — An impending glove shortage is hitting the world, compounded by measures to contain the deadly coronavirus in a country that dominates production: Malaysia.
